overview_of_class: This is a graduate course in statistical physics which includes selections from a wide range of topics: fluctuation-dissipation theory; spatio-temporal correlations and linear response theory; Brownian motion, random walks, polymers; liquid crystals, gels, other sludgy-slimy stuff; and nonequilibrium statistical mechanics.
name: Statistical Physics
title: WCAS PHYSICS 420-0-20 Statistical Physics
